attributes.action: Stop the English F.A. from scrapping FA Cup replays & hurting 100's of clubs
attributes.background:
Hundreds of clubs & their supporters right throughout the football pyramid rely upon often lucrative replays. 

By scrapping them, the F.A. would effectively be giving a kick in the teeth (& bank balance) to all these clubs - merely to serve 5 or 6 clubs competing in Europe. 

Dont let it happen

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. These decisions are the responsibility of the Football Association, which makes the rules governing the conduct of the FA Cup.
